item.description:
We're pilots, we like wings of any kind, right?

OK, let's make the trip this week to HFD. Wx is looking good. Make sure you have new batteries for your flashlights. If we don't get in the air now, we won't until daylight savings time.... So, let's get moving.

Plenty of room usually for passengers. Reverve early and state if you have room or who's flying with you.

See you Wednesday night.

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wings and more Wings at Hartford
